Implementing ChatOps

Pull Request Process?

Create a PR

Validate automatically

Assign it for review

Validate manually

Communicate potential issues

If there are issues, fix them and repeat

If there are no issues, approve the PR

Merge to master

Pull Request Process?

Communication must be documented

It triggers notifications

Notifications lead to actions

â€¦by people with privileges

Pull Request Process?

Comments (Git)

Notifications (Git)

RBAC (Git)

Actions?

ChatOps converts parts of communication into commands that are automatically executed and provides feedback of the results.
